pros: Great Health benefits, Paid Holidays, Sick, Vacation. Great Co-workers.
cons: Hard to get a good sleep schedule at first because of the hours. Some nights harder than others.

pros: Good people with whom to associate and a wonderful team.
cons: Low pay compared to the surrounding universities.

review_title: Great mission and core values - execution of which is always a work in progress
pros: Life-long learning is a great mission statement. This is true for both classroom type of situations as well as real life situations. The college does a great job of carrying that mission throughout its 6 county region.
cons: State of Illinois funding mechanisms leave a lot to be desired which makes long-term planning more difficult than it has to be. In addition, leadership turnover and a recent (due to state incentives) large retirement pool places upon the college an additional burden. Not that this burden cannot be weathered, it just makes things a bit more tenuous.

job_title: Career Services Assistant in Moline, IL
pros:
Some of the most thoughtful and compassionate employees.
Feel like you are really making a difference and helping people. 
Solid entry level office experience.
cons:
Some people comfortable doing the bare minimum and make it hard on people with genuine passion.
Very bureaucratic with cliques.
The administration are very removed from working with the student, the public, or even in higher education, yet they make all the decisions with no feedback from the people working on the ground. 
The pay differences at each level are very appalling considering the lowest paid jobs are essential to daily operations.

pros: The people are wonderful and super friendly. Everyone is here to help the student.
cons: Lack of communication between administration and staff. A lot of changes without notice or reason.

pros: Good experience while being in classes.
cons: Limited hours, this is more of a job for those seeking to earn a little cash while still studying for classes.

pros: Students are great! Flexible work environment from little oversight.
cons: Atmosphere is toxic in some departments. Managers playing favorites based on relationships not performance

pros: Benefits package, new President, strong programs for students
cons: Toxic work environment, tired employees, lots of hurt feelings with no solution to improve
